item.title: Typing Python with typing
item.description: I’ve always been a big fan of the Python programming language. It’s great for prototyping, it has great libraries for data processing and machine learning and it’s overall just a joy to read and write with. But I also like types and if you’re at all familiar with the language then you know that variables are dynamically typed in Python and that type information is absent from the basic syntax.
